their vote count last because the electoral college states. get one electoral college vote for every member of the house of representatives they have plus two for the senate. so a small state like wyoming which only has one us representative also has two senators. so they get three votes for the electoral college, where a large state, like california gets like 50 votes but they also get plus 2. and it's that plus 2 issue that gives the smaller states and unpopulated states.
